newsitem.title: KENYA: Kenyan shilling unchanged against dollar.
newsitem.headline: Kenyan shilling unchanged against dollar.

text.p: The Kenyan shilling was unchanged against the dollar on Wednesday in a mixed market, commercial bank dealers said.
The Central Bank of Kenya posted the shilling at a mean average of 54.71 unchanged against the dollar from Tuesday. Against the pound it was posted at 90.99 from 91.24 on Tuesday.
Some dealers said if the current demand levels continued the shilling would weaken to 54.60/90 levels by Friday this week and added the central bank appeared to favour such a move.
A report on Wednesday from Banque Indosuez said the shilling appeared set to weaken against the dollar following the government's decision on Tuesday to lift a ban on maize imports.
